data.message: dear facebook managment, my friend Ain Jasmin has been hacked by a guy. the guy had change the facebook password of ain jasmin and had post an aggresive and porn status.can you help her? i dont know how to help her.

replies.message: Hi Rania Azzahra. Have your friend follow these instructions on our Help Center for securing a hacked account: https://www.facebook.com/help/131719720300233/. -Lauren
I keep getting hacked. I made my password 10 random numbers now its 20+ random numbers and letter. i keep getting blocked from messaging people and adding people because of this hacker please help.
